name: FPTA Deluxe
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 41

It's not much, but I managed to put together something that can actually be played from start to finish. Even if it only takes a couple of minutes :)

It's a First Person Text Adventure (FPTA) And all you do is walk around and look at text, performing different actions in a specific order to solve the puzzle.

Controls:
Walk: WASD
Look around: Mouse
Inventory: Use left mouse button to select inventory items when visible

Aim at the different texts to highlight them, When they are highlighted you can in most cases use the different actions and use left mouse button to scroll the text.

Have fun!!
